intro.heading: Stop winging it. Build a repeatable system.
paragraphs: Most pub social media is inconsistent because it relies on willpower. You post when you remember, then nothing for weeks.
The fix is a simple routine: one clear hook, a calendar that sells key nights, templates for posts, and a short visibility routine to stay prominent locally.
I'll help you build that system and train your team to run it.

items.title: Channel plan
items.description: What to do on Instagram vs Facebook (and what to ignore) based on your pub type.

items.title: 30-day content calendar
items.description: A plan mapped to the nights you want to fill and the offers you want to sell.

items.title: Template library
items.description: Reusable posts for events, food, sport, promotions, and review responses.

items.title: Local visibility routine
items.description: A small daily habit that improves local reach and brings in real customers.

items.title: Simple scorecard
items.description: Track the numbers that matter: enquiries, bookings, and covers on key nights.

steps.description: We choose the biggest win: midweek, food, events, sport, or bookings.

steps.title: Build the calendar
steps.description: We map out a month of posts around your hook and trading reality.

steps.title: Create assets

steps.title: Measure and iterate
steps.description: We improve the posts that drive action and cut the rest.

faqs.question: Which platform matters most for pubs?
faqs.answer: It depends on your crowd, but most pubs do best with Facebook for local discovery and events, and Instagram for awareness and vibe. We'll pick the right mix.

faqs.question: Do I need to hire someone to run it?
faqs.answer: Not necessarily. With templates and batching, your team can run it in short sessions. Hands-on support is optional.

faqs.question: Will this work without paid ads?
faqs.answer: Yes. We focus on organic wins first: local engagement, clear offers, and consistency. Paid can amplify later.

faqs.question: How quickly will I see results?
faqs.answer: Early movement often shows in days (more messages and enquiries). Results become bankable over 30 days with consistency.

faqs.question: What does it cost?
faqs.answer: £75 per hour plus VAT. Start with a quick setup, then add support if you want.
